runs.comm: nice delivery to start. A fullish length outside off, Vusi stands tall and punches to find extra cover
tight lines, close to off stump on a good length. Sibanda shimmies down to steer to point
honing i n on off stump on a good length. Cut out to backward point
what a shot that is. Fractionally short on middle, Sibanda stays in his crease and pummels a pull wide of midwicket. races to the boundary. good start for Vusi, full of positive intent.

and Sibanda goes. Good length delivery outside off, Sibanda tries to smash the cut over the off side infield but doesn't hit it well at all. The ball lobs up for extra cover to take easily. Bangladesh have an excellent start, Zimbabwe not so much.
pierces the gap nicely in front of backward point. A nice length delivery on a fourth-stump line. RM stands tall and punches it wide of the fielder. Third man cleans up
very full, very wide outside off. Called
full again, overpitched in fact. HM drives into the pitch and over the bowler for a run to mid-off
yorker outside off, jammed out
lovely shot. Hider overpitches again outside off, Mutumbami drives it nicely with the full face of the bat, past mid-off for a boundary
just over mid-on. Not a well-timed shot, but he gets just enough on it. Full delivery on off, Mutumbami looks to go over the bowler's head. The drive spoons just over the fielder
dropped. An absolute sitter that is. A couple of fielders run to Taskin Ahmed to support him. Short delivery down leg, Mutumbami pulls but straight to short fine leg. Taskin spills it over his head.
yorker, dug out to mid-on
slower delivery outside off, chopped into the turf towards point
very good lines these. Top-of-off stuff on off, Mutumbami punches to extra cover
full on middle, guided past a diving backward point for one to third man
too full, too straight. Masakadza swipes it past midwicket for four. Overpitched from Mortaza and made to pay
over adjusts and he is smashed for a boundary through the covers. Too short, too wide. Masakadza plays a thumping cut to the boundary
good length on off, hit back to Mortaza who cannot get out of the line and is struck on the body, the ball deflects towards mid-on for one
full and straight on middle, patted back to the bowler. No turn at all
drags his length back after seeing Hammy advancing. Slapped back awkwardly
picked up beautifully. that is a terrific stroke. Shimmies down and shovels it away over midwicket for a boundary. Excellent batting this
this is massive. First six of the day. Runs to the pitch again but Arafat flights it on a fuller length. Masakadza launches one very easily over mid-off. Humongous hit. great start from Masakadza
whipped away to deep backward square leg for a run
full but down leg, Masakadza finds midwicket
oh my. That is another gigantic strike from Hamilton Masakadza. Full on middle, Masakadza just smashes it over deep midwicket with a nice flow of the bat. Doesn't even watch it go over the boundary
pulled emphatically to deep midwicket. Short on middle, Masakadza drags the ball to the midwicket boundary
full on middle and leg, drilled to long-on
back of a length on off, Mutumbami pushes to wards extra cover and sets off for a quick single. Makes it easy

squirts it just over a backtracking extra cover fielder. The idea on the shot was good but execution was lacking. rather full outside off, Masakadza got under it sufficiently but the ball takes the outside half of the bat and lobs over the fielder
tossed up on middle, Mutumbami comes down and offers the full face of the bat to drive powerfully to the long-on boundary.
bowled flatter and fuller on leg, Mutumbami is hit on the pad after an advance
what has happened there. Flat on middle, RM backs away but inside-halves it back to the bowler and slips over while playing the shot
tucked to deep midwicket with soft hands and the pair race back for the second. Excellent running
fullish down leg, another wide
nurdled to deep midwicket

wide of Mortaza this time. Many chances evading the fielders at the moment. Tossed up on middle and leg, Masakadza launches a sweep but gets a top edge which goes just wide of square leg despite a desperate dive
fullish on off, Mutumbami is struck on the pad after shimmy
dropped down short on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket
flat outside off, cut out to point
Masakadza goes back to find the gap through cover with a cut
pushed to deep cover
awful delivery. Short down leg, Masakadza sweeps convincingly albeit a tad uppish. Evades short fine leg and whistles to the fine leg boundary
shortish on off, a punch finds cover
very full, very wide. Inside the tramline. Missed by the batsman
pushed to long-on. No turn
slower through the air on leg, Masakadza misses his tuck and is struck on the pads. Sliding down leg
flat on leg, inside-edged onto the boot
flat on middle, hit down to long-on. Good over from Shakib
good length outside off, short and wide. Should have been put away. HM finds point with a cut
excellent delivery that. Speared in the blockhole on off, Masakadza walks across and is hit on the back boot as he falls over. Outside the line though
mis-timed drive to long-on
backs away and steers to third man
wide yorker outside off, smeared to square leg off the inside edge. The keeper collects
slower delivery on leg, worked to deep midwicket. Just the one
crack. What a shot from Mutumbami. Backed away, saw the flighted delivery early and launched a drive right over the bowler's head for a massive six.
flat-batted to long-off
very full and quick on leg, Hammy is struck on the pad down leg
slower throguh the air and wide, inside-edged towards the keeper who runs around and under-arms te throw to the strikers end with HM sloppily lingering outside the crease
clipped to deep midwicket for a couple.
flat on leg, patted back

cleaned im up. What a yorker. terrific execution. Speared in on leg. Mutumbami walks across but misses his steer and the leg stump is uprooted. Great start to the over for Bangladesh. Good counterattacking innings from Mutumbami
another yorker on off, Waller guides to point for one
looks for that yorker again but misses badly. Ends up as a full toss outside off, swatted to long-off
well down leg, another wide
nice change in length. Shortish outside off, played down to third man
fullish delivery on off, pushed to long-off
short down leg. Yet another wide
good length outside off, pushed to deep cover for one
tossed up. Overpitched. Drilled to long-on
flat on middle, no turn. Punched to long-on
awful delivery. Short down leg, asking for trouble. Waller helps it on its way over the backward square leg boundary. Not a good ball but good striking from Waller
overpitched on off, hit to long-on
fullish on middle, worked to long-on against the turn. Maskadza gets to fifty. Fantastic innings
flat on middle and off, Waller opens the face to guide through covers for a run
looking for that yorker outside off, creamed to the deep cover
supreme timing from Masakadza. Full down leg, poor ball. Hammy lifts it wide of square leg for four. Runs leaking
yorker on off, pushed to cover

pathetic bowling this. Missing his deliveries all too often. this time, a high full toss on middle. right in the swinging arc and Waller takes full toll. Swings it away high and wide over midwicket for yet another six.
better but that was in the slot as well if Waller wanted. Full on middle, pushed to long-off
was that a drop? Full on middle, Masakadza looks to turn to long-on but gets a thick outside half of the bat with the slight away movement. Hider spills a very hard chance.
this is poor bowling. The experience Shakib offers a high full toss to Hammy who shimmies down and whacks the punchy drive high over the long-off boundary
flat down leg, off the inside half to cover
tossed up on off, Waller comes down and just lifts the ball over the long-on boundary. Easily done.
worked to square leg for a couple.
wider of the crease, pushed to cover for one
the poor bowling continues. Flat down leg, Masakadza pulls out the sweep and connects nicely. Wide of the fielder and to the fine leg boundary. The batsmen not having to do much to get these runs
good length on off, played down to point
very full delivery on off, Masakadza clips to deep midwicket
full on leg, drilled to long-on
overly full on leg, worked down to fine leg
easy runs. Waller backs away, Mortaza follows. Waller just tickles it fine to the boundary, just too easy at the moment.
slower delivery on leg, lofted to long-off

splendid yorker from Taskin. Right into the blockhole with some inward movement as well. Waller makes some room but he ball sneaks between bat and pad and clatters into the stumps. Beautiful delivery that
short delivery on off, well-directed. Raza hurries under
full on off, some tail back in. Pushed to deep cover
exceptional yorker again on middle. Defended back
low full toss on middle and leg, looking for that yorker. Clipped to deep midwicket
short delivery outside off, Raza leaves. Wide called
full on off, outside edged to third man
flatter on middle, cut to point. Almost got through

50th wicket for Shakib. Sees Raza coming down, fires it full and wide but inside the tramline. Raza is miles out of his crease and the keeper does the rest. Well done from Shakib. Just starting to pull things back
full outside off, driven to deep cover
very wide, bounces on the wide line. Umpire calls a wide though
low full toss on leg, driven back
goes for the reverse sweep, doesn't get it at all. Off the top edge and over the keeper for a run
drilled to the sweeper cover
slower ball on off, tickled towards deep midwicket looking for two. But just one
slower ball on leg, Masakadza slog sweeps wide of square leg for a couple. Plonks in the surface
low full toss on off and middle, drilled down past the stumps for a couple. Nicely played, the fielder cleans up
this time it is massive. Slower delivery on middle and leg, Masakadza launches it high and very deep over the midwicket boundary.
gets down early now to ramp over the fine leg fielder. This is magnificent batting.
down leg this time, off the pad and to the keeper.
low full toss outside off, squeezed to deep cover
full and wide outside off, Masakadza goes for the sweep and is struck on the pad. One leg bye
full and wide yorker outside off, Chigumbura is beaten
full and wide, Chigs finds point. Another dot ball
full and wide, shaped away. Another miss
what an over. Just terrific. Late swing. Yorker on off, the ball moves away very late and beats the bat. Just two off it.
wide yorker outside off, smeared down to long-on
full and wide. Patted back to the bowler.
misses the yorker this time and that is massive. Low full toss outside off, Masakadza lays into it with all his might and muscles it over deep long-on.
nice yorker. Jammed out to deep midwicket, two runs. Good running
good end. Yorker on leg, Masakadza misses and is struck on the pad. Zimbabwe finish with 180.
